Definition.description: Any value between and including minimumValue and maximiumValue is valid.
Definition.name: urn:ogc:def:rangeMeaning:OGC:1.0:exact

Definition.description: The axis is continuous with values wrapping around at the minimumValue and maximumValue. Values with the same meaning repeat modulo the difference between maximumValue and minimumValue.
Definition.name: urn:ogc:def:rangeMeaning:OGC:1.0:wraparound
